testsuite.name: com.amazon.test.AmazonSearchTest

testcase.name: test_Department_Filter
testcase.system-out: Selecting 'Electronics' department and searching 'Headphones' Assertion passed: department filter applied with results

testcase.name: test_Search_Valid_Enter
testcase.system-out: Searching 'Mobile' via Enter key Assertion passed: results shown for 'Mobile'

testcase.name: test_Suggestions_SingleChar
testcase.system-out: Typing single character 'h' to check suggestions Suggestions loaded: [hand bags for women stylish, headphones bluetooth wireless, hp laptop i5 13th generation 16gb ram, helmet for bike, hair dryer for woman, home decoration items for living room, handwash refill pack, harpic 1 litre, headphones wireless with mic, hot wheels set]

testcase.name: test_Invalid_NoResults
testcase.system-out: Searching invalid term: zzzxxxyyyqwe123456 noResults=false, suggestions=false, resultsCount=12, rewritten=false, textSuggests=false, genericResultsForInvalid=true, titles=[] Handled invalid term as expected

testcase.name: test_Search_Valid_Click
testcase.system-out: Opening Amazon home page Typed 'Laptop' in the search box Clicked search button Results page loaded for 'Laptop' Assertion passed: results shown for 'Laptop'

testcase.name: test_Suggestions_UpdateOnMoreChars
testcase.system-out: Typing 'm', then appending 'o' to verify suggestions update First: [motorola phone 5g, macbook air m4, moto edge 60 fusion 5g, mobile phone under 20000, my order details, motorola edge 60 pro, mixer grinder 750, motorola edge 60 fusion, microwave for kitchen, mosquito killer racket] | Second: [motorola phone 5g, moto edge 60 fusion 5g, mobile phone under 20000, mobile phone under 2000+0, motorola edge 60 pro, motorola edge 60 fusion, mosquito killer racket, mouse for laptop, moto g85 5g, moto g85 5+g]

testcase.name: test_Alphanumeric_Valid
testcase.system-out: Searching 'iPhone 15' Assertion passed: results shown for 'iPhone 15'

testcase.name: test_LongString_Accepted
testcase.system-out: Searching a very long string (length=620) Assertion passed: page handled long input

testcase.name: test_Suggestions_SelectItem
testcase.system-out: Typing 'hea' and selecting first suggestion Chosen suggestion: headphones bluetooth wireless Assertion passed: search box matches chosen suggestion

testcase.name: test_Search_Empty_NoNavigation
testcase.system-out: Verifying empty search keeps user on the same page Assertion passed: empty search did not navigate

testsuite.system-out: Searching 'iPhone 15' Assertion passed: results shown for 'iPhone 15' Selecting 'Electronics' department and searching 'Headphones' Assertion passed: department filter applied with results Searching invalid term: zzzxxxyyyqwe123456 noResults=false, suggestions=false, resultsCount=12, rewritten=false, textSuggests=false, genericResultsForInvalid=true, titles=[] Handled invalid term as expected Searching a very long string (length=620) Assertion passed: page handled long input Verifying empty search keeps user on the same page Assertion passed: empty search did not navigate Opening Amazon home page Typed 'Laptop' in the search box Clicked search button Results page loaded for 'Laptop' Assertion passed: results shown for 'Laptop' Searching 'Mobile' via Enter key Assertion passed: results shown for 'Mobile' Typing 'hea' and selecting first suggestion Chosen suggestion: headphones bluetooth wireless Assertion passed: search box matches chosen suggestion Typing single character 'h' to check suggestions Suggestions loaded: [hand bags for women stylish, headphones bluetooth wireless, hp laptop i5 13th generation 16gb ram, helmet for bike, hair dryer for woman, home decoration items for living room, handwash refill pack, harpic 1 litre, headphones wireless with mic, hot wheels set] Typing 'm', then appending 'o' to verify suggestions update First: [motorola phone 5g, macbook air m4, moto edge 60 fusion 5g, mobile phone under 20000, my order details, motorola edge 60 pro, mixer grinder 750, motorola edge 60 fusion, microwave for kitchen, mosquito killer racket] | Second: [motorola phone 5g, moto edge 60 fusion 5g, mobile phone under 20000, mobile phone under 2000+0, motorola edge 60 pro, motorola edge 60 fusion, mosquito killer racket, mouse for laptop, moto g85 5g, moto g85 5+g]
